DOC.brief_summary: Total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) inhalation anesthesia widely safely use , many clinical trial compare various aspect anesthesia . However , study compare quality recovery different method general anesthesia . In study , investigator compare functional recovery general anesthesia TIVA inhalation anesthesia QoR-40 questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Propofol-remifentanil Total Intravenous Anesthesia Desflurane-remifentanil Balanced Anesthesia With Regard Post-anesthetic Functional Recovery Measured With QoR-40
DOC.criteria: patient undergo thyroid operation belong ASA class 1 2 patient belongs ASA class 3 , patient underlie complicate cardiovascular psychological disease .
